content: timeless boho poncho by carolyn calderon updated pattern with video now available this poncho is a classic addition to your wardrobe the self-striping yarn makes it simple to make on autopilot watching your favorite show easy to customize with fringe and edgings the adult medium uses about 2 1/2 skeins of red heart boutique unforgettable please see pattern website for more information thank you for your interest in my designs have a great day carolyn text and images c the purple poncho all rights reserved
